task.summary: Default task
Added a quick comment (to test git)
Comments and additional meta files - Commented posts.html for future reference - Added license, readme files

Chapter 4, page 48 - Minor Comment

Still Troubleshooting - merged to answer set, but still not working quite right.

Ch 5 - Fixed REST API endpoint - Got page to load without errors - Unable to get post to work via the web page
Ch 5 Done - I have a working app finally
